topic.title: List of trackers?
topic.body: Where do I go to to get a full list of available trackers? Do I just use Syncronite?

topic.title: Newcomers to ZeroNet
topic.body: Seems like the official repo is stale because nofish is gone. Which fork should new people clone from to get started? Do we have a consensus here on a single fork or is this community splitted?

topic.title: ZeroSites with no peers
topic.body: I think zites with no peers should not be displayed on ZeroSites

topic.title: SiaSkynet
topic.body: Is it possible to use sites like https://siasky.net/ as peers? Would that solve the problem with some zites having no peers?

topic.title: The trackers button on the homepage
topic.body: The trackers button on the home page should be scrollable when becoming to large instead of taking up the whole screen

topic.title: Dead trackers
topic.body: How do we filter dead trackers?

topic.title: Mastodon
topic.body: One thing Mastodon got right was the federated timeline, it liks exposes the networks activity and tells you how active the network is, is it possible to have something similar here?

1623356651_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: How is it dead? It seems very alive and growing?

1633231545_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: I had side-effects, but not this bizzare. I only had a bit of headache and feelt exhausted.

1631920972_15nqVJAHdxk2KxMwvCp4iiXfj4BtY.body: You won't find any as complete as ZN

1632925044_19TrKZA9ifR8bvPbL64AbNqttCDkW.body: Anyone mind explaining what this is to a newcomer?

1630944991_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8B.body:
> [quantumkitty](#comment_14_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): Eventually yeah. Just focus on posting and drawing in more users for now

They'll arrive by themselfs as long as this network doesn't get boring.

1632848743_1Qq4LP4T9LVbrnWLcUiQCXkMXJfPR.body: Our biggest issue currently as a society is disinformation, we are almost unable to tell truth apart from a lie.

1630381630_17NZ2BiZ1HUYppUcUmU5bgyGkp8kH.body:
> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_48_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): I've listed all known and working TORv3 trackers on Syncronite. [...]

What does Syncronite do?

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_113_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): Syncronite syncs with anonymoose's and ngosang's trackers lists, merges them together as Syncronite.html and publishes using crontab which periodically executes Syncronite.sh from my laptop. [...]

Beautiful!

1630497564_19AuD3C3VusewLWehweVi29XupaG5.body: Why would people hate on ZeroNet?

1632704104_1QJu7G65kp7mtDiDX2b19eJWe88rN.body: You should explain what that server is for

1624835115_129GZPA7VpPa3YaRRW2ani34CaowY.body:
> [suchamazingdude](#comment_2_1ByMNprXfr5dSfPErFqLPW1nvqAZphqR5D): zeronet is alive as long as you using it. so just dont stop using it and everything will be cool

The upside with decentralization

1633271108_14NiXkEXrFAHokAohyiCv5PCAXLcE.body:
> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_117_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): The text overlapping for TORv3 trackers also needs to be resolved.

You're right!

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_120_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): I've already fixed this on my laptop. [...]

You're gold

1633270250_14NiXkEXrFAHokAohyiCv5PCAXLcE.body:
> [drac](#comment_1_13mR7jsD9TzpUXY9HzMhyi3SK3EbjhA4ZY): It's a good idea for project developers...

Thanks!
